content: I will need access to the sandbox
Hey Patrick, let me know if you got an invitation to the sandbox.
If anyone needs access to the sandbox, please post your request here.
hi. i got an invite, but it was for the DaVinciAlertsRecipientA ... The sandbox url is supposed to be: https://sandbox.hspconsortium.org/DaVinciAlertsEHR
@Jacob Crump just checking to see if you noticed the message from Patrick...
@Patrick Haren It looks like you are already a member of that sandbox. Let me know if you have trouble opening it.
@Jacob Crump yes. I got it. Thanks
@Jacob Crump Can you grant me access to the sandbox too?
@Mike Ross I just sent you an invitation. Let me know if you have any problems.
@Jacob Crump Perfect. Thank you. Got it.
Please grant me access to the sandbox!
I sent you an invitation @Sunanda McGarvey

Hi. Did the format of the $notify post change?
I tried posting the bundle I did earlier and now I am getting the following error.
{
"resourceType": "OperationOutcome",
"issue": [
{
"severity": "error",
"code": "processing",
"diagnostics": "Failed to call access method: java.lang.ClassCastException: org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Bundle cannot be cast to org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Parameters"
}
]
}

It doesn't change in IG, but sender app had issue with parameters structure, we had 2 parameters but instead in IG it is required to have 1 parameter with 2 parts inside
By fixing that structure issue I might change format , sorry for that :)
Also there were issues with CI pipeline, and now sender app is fixed and deployed. so it is working now. And it is working right.

Hi All,
I need the access to sandbox
